category.title: Category
category.description:
Category under which Jupytext Text Notebooks will be placed.

Refresh the current browser tab for the changes to take effect.

format.title: Jupytext Text Notebook Launcher Items Formats
format.description:
List of Jupytext Text Notebook formats that will be added to launcher.

When format "auto" is used, it will be replaced by available kernels. For instance, if Python and R kernels are installed, format "auto:light" will add launcher items to create Python and R Text notebooks with light format.

Refresh the current browser tab for the changes to take effect.
